name: Delcam 3D Model File
summary: Learn about .DGK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Using Delcam Exchange, DGK files can be converted into other industry CAD file formats, such as .IGS, .STEP, and .STL.

description: Three-dimensional model created by Delcam CAD programs, including PowerSHAPE, PowerMILL, CopyCAD, PowerInspect, and ArtCAM; contains the model geometry, which is comprised of wireframes, surfaces, and solids; used to save and load 3D designs.
